      • isInNewScheduleMode

        private boolean isInNewScheduleMode
        Controls scheduling type If set to true, the command exam schedule is submitted to the server. Otherwise the command exam reschedule is executed.

        private javax.swing.JButton saveButton

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExamScheduler

        public ExamScheduler()
        Allows the examiner to schedule an exam.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshInputFields

        private void refreshInputFields()
        Refreshes input fields. Reads from the underlying data model and refreshes the table in the main view.

      • saveChanges

        private void saveChanges()
        Puts the changes to the server. Schedules or reschedules the exam. The private variable isInNewScheduleMode controls which mode is selected.

      • unschedule

        void unschedule()
        Unschedules the exam
